## NS.hasTorRouter() method

Returns whether the player has access to the darkweb.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
hasTorRouter(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

Whether player has access to the dark web.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.05GB

## Example 1


```js
// NS1:
if (hasTorRouter()) tprint("TOR router detected.");
```

## Example 2


```js
// NS2:
if (ns.hasTorRouter()) tprint("TOR router detected.");
```
